description.displayText:
I highly recommend Amanda for a position caring for your children, an older parent or anyone else you love and care about.  Amanda is a very bright, kind, thoughtful, well educated young woman.  She has common sense and good judgement when faced with new situations.  She is very mature for her age.

I am a busy executive who used Amanda to assist me in setting up my home office and taking care of things that I didn't have time to handle myself.  She is terrific, very organized and approaches things in a systematic way.

I know Amanda loves working with kids and would welcome a position caring for others.  She is someone who would work with you to plan out the day/evening and make sure there are interesting and fun things for your kids to do.  She has a college degree, so she can also assist them with homework.  

I really think Amanda is terrific and hope you consider her for a position or even occasional work.  I know you will be glad you did.  Zena

description.displayText: Amanda has worked for us for close to two years taking excellent care of our twin 4 year old boys. She is punctual and professional, and handles our boys in a loving and structured way. Amanda is very focused on the boys' development, and is diligent about combining fun with learning experiences.  She is committed to helping the boys study different topics, and has helped greatly with basic skills such as reading and math. Our boys have benefited greatly from Amanda's care, and I would highly recommend her to any family with small children.
